feedbacks.text: Sergey is without a doubt one of the best freelancers we have worked with to date. I look forward to many project with Sergey in the future.
feedbacks.author: Joe R.

feedbacks.text: It was great working with Sergey. If you need someone for your worpress website, you should hire him. I look forward to working with him again.
feedbacks.author: Isabel G.

feedbacks.text: One of the best freelancers I have worked with. Competent, professional, and a pleasure to talk to. Looking forward to the next project to work with Sergey!
feedbacks.author: Joe R.

feedbacks.text: HIRE Sergey! He's the best!! When it comes to creating professional, attractive, and effective websites, there is no one that can surpass Sergey. He's quick to respond, happy to meet your needs, and an all-around fantastic developer and designer. He is detailed, organized, creative, and just truly a pleasure to work with.
feedbacks.author: Susan L.

feedbacks.text: Excellent PSD TO HTML coder and superb quality, thank you!
feedbacks.author: Shahid H.

feedbacks.text: Sergey was extremely fast in fixing my issue and in fact was the only freelancer who was proactive in guiding me with a solution right at the start. Confident teacher and very helpful and expert in diagnosing my problem and coming up with the perfect solution. Would hire again for sure!
feedbacks.author: Kaizen Ltd.

feedbacks.text: Sergey is absolutely fantastic to work with! Highly skilled, fast, professional and easy to communicate with! Will use him again for any future needs!
feedbacks.author: Susan L.

services.title:
PSD-to-HTML
coding
services.text: High-quality, pretty, valid code. I love coding things from scratch, but I can work with front-end frameworks like Bootstrap too. Also work with .sketch/Zeplin mockups.

services.title:
Wordpress websites
development
services.text: Creating unique and professional design, wordpress theme development (coding), domain and hosting registration, filling content.

services.title: Creating CSS/SVG/JS animations
services.text: I have a lot of experience with CSS3 animations. Also I love to work with SVG to create optimize and high-performance animations.

services.title:
Creating additional
functionality
services.text: Photogalleries, sliders, calculators, video players, maps, popups, callback forms etc.
